product_name: Manduka eKO SuperLite Travel Mat Yoga Mat
long_description: Take your yoga practice on the road with the Manduka eKO SuperLite(R) Travel Mat yoga mat. It weighs only 2 lbs. and can be folded to fit in small travel spaces. Mat is made from biodegradable, non-Amazon-harvested tree rubber. Contains no PVC; no toxic chemicals are used in the manufacturing process of the Manduka eKO SuperLite Travel Mat yoga mat. Textured top layer provides good grip; closed-cell foam won't absorb sweat. Stretch-resistant scrim layer is made from biodegradable cotton and recycled silk. Top layer and scrim layer are bonded with a heating process; no glues are used.
short_description: Take your yoga practice on the road with the Manduka eKO SuperLite(R) Travel Mat yoga mat. It weighs only 2 lbs. and can be folded to fit in small travel spaces.
